presicion problem (double -> int).
(1) In one place we do all the math in double and cast the result to int only at the end. 
(2) In the other place we cast all the parts (baseline, descent, etc) to int and then add the them together.

Other option is to round all doubles (i.e. 'int i = (int)(d + 0.5);').
SSQ: What do you think ? didn't you face the same problem on GDI+ ?
